Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.CharacterCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
Centaur, Farmer, Friar, Harvester, Herald, Herbalist, Jester, Knight, Mailman, Minstrel, Princess, Thief
public abstract class CharacterCard extends Object
Abstract class of a character card.
